docs.text: Production Environment Setup ¶ Operating System ¶ Required Packages ¶ mysql yarn nvm ( https://tecadmin.net/how-to-install-nvm-on-debian-10/ ) => Current or LTS Version Optional Packages ¶ apache2 nginx NodeJS ¶ nvm install node or nvm install --lts nvm use node or nvm use --lts Navigate to the project folder run yarn install --production Database ¶ Configuration ¶ Create a root user with the password toor Create a new database called nextjs_prisma ( CREATE DATABASE nextjs_prisma; ) Try and check the connection to the database Migrations ¶ run in the project folder yarn prisma generate run in the project folder yarn prisma migrate deploy check if the tables are created in the database Start the application ¶ run yarn run build run yarn run start open the browser and navigate to http://localhost:3000
